tool_description: Email Validation Service.check if a certain e-mail address is valid. Is it a valid domain? Is the e-mail a temporary/disposable e-mail? Our API contain 100k disposable email domains and give most valid email
title: Disposable Email Checker

api_list.name: Email Checker
api_list.description: check the email provided by user for registration is valid or not or may be disposable email.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://disposable-email-checker2.p.rapidapi.com/disposable/{email}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "disposable-email-checker2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
